July 2, 1887 D Sowerby Contest
Sowerby Contest 0 Other
sowerby-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Hail Apollo
Sowerby Grammar School, Sowerby (West Riding),Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £9, 3rd £5, 4th £3, 5th £1. The Black Dyke Mills Band had entered; but having taken part in a similar contest at Batley, they arrived on the field a few minutes too late. Result obtained from Brass Band News August 1887. 5 bands competed
Dec. 29, 2011, 11:39 p.m. Sept. 4, 2016, 6:34 a.m.
